name: hotel_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Fetches detailed information about a specified hotel from the Priceline API.

hotel_id.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

airport_limit.description: Limit the number of nearby airports included in the response.

promo.description: Toggle the hotels promo data on and off. By default, promo data is excluded in the response. To include promo data in the response, set promo to 1.

photos.description: Toggles photo data. By default, hotel photo data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

videos.description: Flag to include video data. Default is False.

guest_score_breakdown.description: Toggle guest score breakdown on and off. Valid Options: True or False

reviews.description: Toggle hotel review data. By default, review data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = On.

city_limit.description: Limit the number of cities included in the response.

important_info.description: Toggles important info. Important info is extra details regarding the specified hotel. By default, important info is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

recent.description: Flag to include recent sales data. Default is False.

poi_limit.description: Limit the number of points of interest included in the response.

plugins.description: Provides extra information regarding plugins for the specified hotel. To include specific plugin information, include the ID of the plugin as a comma separated value to the plugins parameter.

image_size.description: The size of the image returned. Valid Options: small (60px), medium(300 to 312px) or large(500 to 800px)

id_lookup.description: Allows non-PPN Hotel IDs to be searched in the database. Valid Options: True or False

currency.description: The currency format for the results, in ISO 4217 format.

nearby.description: Toggles nearby data. Nearby data is extra information regarding the specified hotel s location. Nearby data can include city_data, airport_data, and poi_category_data. By default, nearby data is excluded from the response. To include nearby data, set nearby to 1. To include city_data within nearby data, include a city_limit parameter to a value greater than 1.
